description: This file is a C header file that declares functions and includes necessary headers for the 'telcovoicemgrhal' module related to voice management. It contains macro definitions, include guards, function prototypes for initializing and retrieving voice service data, and external references.

methods.name: telcovoicemgrhal_initdata
methods.description: Initializes voice manager HAL data with a status parameter.

methods.name: telcovoicemgrhal_getlinestats
methods.description: Retrieves line statistics based on parameter name.

methods.name: telcovoicemgrhal_getcapabilities
methods.description: Retrieves capabilities information into provided structure.

methods.name: telcovoicemgrhal_getvoiceprofile
methods.description: Gets voice profile details for a specified voice service index.

methods.name: telcovoicemgrhal_getphyinterface
methods.description: Retrieves physical interface data for a specified voice service index.
